trends: There have been 404 other sightings in Los Angeles
There were no other sightings in Los Angeles on or around November 30th 1978
Summary: orange disk between San Pedro and Catalina Island,
divs: Sighting DetailsI was 12 years old and I had just taken a bath and was in my pajamas. It wasalmost twilight. I looked out my bedroom window toward Catalina Island, whichwas about 25 miles west. Our apartment was about 5 miles from the Californiacoast. Over the ocean I saw a glowing orange disc, standing still in the sky. Itstood still for several moments, and then began to move in a downward arc, goingcounterclockwise, to about the 8 oclock position. It stopped, very briefly.After a second or so, it shot up out of site at very high speed. At first I hadthought it was some kind of rocket or missile, because I had seen launches overthe ocean before. My reaction was matter-of-fact both during and after theincident, but now, 25 years later, I remember it like it was yesterday.
